watches.name: Titan Women's Lagan Watch: Rose Gold Accents & Refined Elegance
watches.description: Achieve timeless elegance with this watch featuring a clean white dial, dotted gold indices, and skeletal hands. The sliding clasp ensures ultimate comfort, while stone detailing and a rose gold dial add a touch of sophistication. Perfect for both casual and dressy occasions, pair it with a floral sundress or an elegant evening gown.

watches.description: 3. 9 CM AMOLED Display with 480x480 resolution and 1000 nits peak brightness, delivering crisp visuals even under direct sunlight. Equipped with a dual-core chipset and fluidic UI for a seamless user experience, along with dynamic watch faces for personalized styling. SingleSync BT Calling and quick reply support for easy communications.

watches.name: Titan Raga Quartz Analog Rose Gold Round Dial Rose Gold Metal Strap Watch For Women
watches.description: Add a touch of romance to your evenings with this Raga watch. The sectional glistening rose gold dial and rose gold metal case, paired with a linked square design bracelet, create an enchanting and stylish timepiece. Perfect for date nights, this watch enhances your charm and complements your elegant attire.

watches.name: Titan Women's Lagan Chic: Studded Brown Dial watch with & Elegant Hands
watches.description: Embrace everyday sophistication with this sleek and small watch featuring a brown classic dial, dotted indices, and stone detailing. The rose gold bezel and light grey leather straps make it perfect for everyday wear. Style it with tailored trousers and a blouse for a polished and feminine look suitable for the office or casual outings.
